sentences.en: ...a horrifying videotape of a man swinging from a noose.
sentences.cn: …一盘一名男子吊在绞索上的恐怖录像带。

sentences.en: As the prisoner fell, the noose would snap his neck.
sentences.cn: 在犯人往下掉的时候, 绞索圈套就会突然勒紧他的脖子.
小心! 这里有个陷阱.

sentences.en: He cut the rope then and went astern to noose the tail.
sentences.cn: 然后他割下一截绳子,走到船梢去套住鱼尾巴.

sentences.en: He's facing the hangman's noose , ie waiting to be hanged.
I found a piece of rope, made a noose, slipped it about the kitten's neck.
sentences.cn: 我找来一根绳子,打了个扣, 顺手一撸套上了小猫的脖子.

sentences.en: Ill put my head in a noose.
Many a necklace becomes a noose.
sentences.cn: 一根又一根的(金)项链化成了圈套.

sentences.en: Official video of the hanging shows Barzan being beheaded by the noose.
sentences.cn: 官方录像显示被绞索斩首.

sentences.en: Put one's head in a noose.
Sikes made a running noose, and called him again.
sentences.cn: 赛克斯打了个一勒就紧的套结, 又叫他一声.
[美俚]一切都准备好了;大家都在等待[期待].

sentences.en: Then Sikes slipped and fell ! The noose was round his neck.
sentences.cn: 这时,赛克斯一滑,掉了下去,活结套在了他的脖子上.

sentences.en: This time you have really put your head in the noose.
sentences.cn: 这次你真是自投罗网了.

sentences.en: To capture or hold by or as if by a noose.
sentences.cn: 诱捕用或似乎用绳圈来捕或抓.

sentences.en: When you hang a noose, that's no joke to us.
sentences.cn: 当你挂上绞索的时, 这对我们来说并不是个玩笑.

phrases.phrase: put one's head in a noose

trans.tran_en: A noose is a circular loop at the end of a piece of rope or wire. A noose is tied with a knot that allows it to be tightened, and it is usually used to trap animals or hang people.
